text.config.mrdogsâ€”config.title: Mr. Dog's Mod Config
text.config.mrdogs-config.option.randomE: The random effect(s) is activated every <value> seconds. Set to -1 to disable.
text.config.mrdogs-config.option.morphTo: Whether to morph the player to a wolf.
text.config.mrdogs-config.option.customW: Specify the name to use for wolf entities and wolf-related items.
text.config.mrdogs-config.option.removeC: Remove all content of crash report.
text.config.mrdogs-config.option.replace: Replace Chinese Characters with Corresponding Pinyin
Whether to replace Chinese characters with their corresponding pinyin letters (via TinyPinyin).
text.config.mrdogs-config.option.escapin: Whether to move widgets away on mouse hover.
text.config.mrdogs-config.option.trollUr: Specify the uri to open when opening server links.
text.config.mrdogs-config.option.morphed: Specify the entity dimensions to use for the morphed wolf entity.
text.config.mrdogs-config.option.logScre: Whether to log its class name whenever a screen is opened.
text.mrdogs-mod.no_attacking_wolves: [Mr. Dog's Mod] No attacking your own species!
text.mrdogs-mod.no_taming_wolves: [Mr. Dog's Mod] Your own species does not want to be tamed by you!
text.mrdogs-mod.no_using_portals: [Mr. Dog's Mod] Dogs do not know how to use portals
text.mrdogs-mod.stuck_in_cobweb: [Mr. Dog's Mod] Congratulations! You are stuck in cobweb forever!
text.mrdogs-mod.crash_report_message: [Mr. Dog's Mod] To solve the problem of Minecraft crashing, we have removed the crash report
text.mrdogs-mod.fake_death: [Mr. Dog's Mod] What a shame... You did not die; it's fake
